title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.12 - Oral argument; briefs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.12 - Oral argument; briefs

State Regulations

Oral argument shall be made only before the administrative
judge and shall be included in the record of the hearing. Briefs as to facts or
law may be received and may be required to be submitted. The administrative
judge may fix the time within which briefs shall be filed. Briefs received
subsequent to such time need not be considered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
6.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
